text: A hologram is a three-dimensional image created by holography. Hologram may also refer to: *Hologram (band), a British progressive rock band *Hologram (EP), by Eiko Shimamiya, 2001 *"Hologram" (Minmi song), 2015 *"Hologram" (Nico Touches the Walls song), 2009 *"Hologram", a song by Backstreet Boys from This Is Us, 2009 *"Hologram", a song by Chris Spedding from Enemy Within, 1986 *"Hologram", a song by the Horrors from V, 2017 *Holograms, the fictional band in the 1980s animated series Jem and the Holograms ==See also== *Holography (disambiguation)
title: Hologram (disambiguation)
